segments.text: I notice the woman so absorbed in drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her towel is all bunched up around it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water from the sink is flowing right past her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad she doesn't see the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's widening, and it could ruin the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's climbing on that shaky stool for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He might fall and get hurtâ€”poor kid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting patiently, hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look like they're having a little adventure together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But it's risky with the wet floor nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is full, tempting them like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is calm, unaware of the trouble inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing bad happens to break this family moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just a typical kitchen mishap, I guess.
segments.speaker: PAR
